Text:
LOL Yeah, it's episode 1 of the new series.  There was an old American Gladiators (circa 1991 or so) that this is a remake of.  Thanks for the upload, forgot to set the DVR for it.  I can't wait to see what kind of trainwreck it is.  

BTW, this stars Leyla Ali and Hulk Hogan, among oththers.
